long_description: Soft, cushioned and forgiving, the women's Burton Citizen bindings are a great choice if you're an all-mountain rider looking to progress to the next level. Women-specific True Fit(TM) design brings the whole package together to create the most comfortable connection possible. Single-component, lightweight yet tough, polycarbonate baseplates create moderate flex and consistent response for a versatile ride on all terrain. Full adjustability offers up a perfect fit, while wall-to-wall EVA padding and the added heel hold of the adaptable toe straps create comfort that just won't quit. Single-component, symmetric highbacks are responsive and feature a cored design to save weight; they rotate to follow natural leg contours, optimizing comfort and power. Tool-free, forward-lean adjustment lets you dial in and lock forward lean angle on the fly; highbacks feature Over The Top padding for extra cushioning. Lushly padded ankle straps lock you into the bindings; they're precurved for natural fit and feature telescoping and multilocation adjustability. Toe straps can be worn over the top of your boots or across the toes to lock heels in place; Smooth Glide(TM) buckles are strong and easy to grab for quick closure. Bindings are compatible with traditional 3D(TM), 4x4 bolt patterns and The Channel.
